EmailTemplate.description: Auto generated response sent to Store Associate for new lead
EmailTemplate.name: Lead Submittal Response to Store Associate
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for the Customer Referral to Sears Commercial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.Store_Associate_Name__c},
This email notification is confirmation that your referral for {!Lead.Company} has been forwarded to a Sears Commercial Account Manager. The Account Manager will be contacting {!Lead.Name} shortly in order to discuss their {!Lead.Products_Services__c} needs. We look forward to assisting the customer and ensuring they stay with Sears for the products and services they need!
Best Regards, Sears Commercial Team
